markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10+"
    pfs=""
>
[Dinosaur Boots](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1299)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 42</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The tough, scaled leather of these heavy boots comes from a mighty dinosaur, granting you the steadiness of a lumbering beast. Any time an action or effect would cause you to make a [forced movement](/Rules.aspx?ID=451), roll a DC 17 flat check. On a success, the forced movement fails to affect you.

<document level="2" id="action-1026" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Dinosaur Boots
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 42</row>

**Price** 950 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 16"
pfs="Standard"
>
Dinosaur Boots (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 42</row>

**Price** 9,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

The activation makes you grow to size Huge, if you choose, with the effects of 4th-level _enlarge_. Either way, the damage die of your foot unarmed attack increases from 1d4 to 1d8, and you can use Trample as many times as you want during the activation.
name: Dinosaur Boots
